tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE error_circuits (
    circuit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_type VARCHAR(50),
    circuit_name VARCHAR(100),
    circuit_description TEXT,
    detection_method VARCHAR(50),
    correction_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ErrorDetectionCircuits (
 circuit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 circuit_name VARCHAR(255),
 circuit_type VARCHAR(50),
 detection_method VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ErrorCorrectionCircuits (
 circuit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 circuit_name VARCHAR(255),
 circuit_type VARCHAR(50),
 correction_method VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE CircuitRelationship (
 relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 detection_circuit_id INT,
 correction_circuit_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (detection_circuit_id) REFERENCES ErrorDetectionCircuits(circuit_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (correction_circuit_id) REFERENCES ErrorCorrectionCircuits(circuit_id)
)
